markdownRemark.html: CILE is a Spanish school in Málaga, Spain. They offer different types of Spanish courses, accommodation and activities. The school is located right in the historic centre of Malaga, next to the cathedral and its gardens, in a traditional 19th century building. They offer a wide range of different Spanish language courses, activities and accommodation.
